description.value:
Greet the Moon
Minor Rite

Time: 1 bonus action
Cost: 1 Gnosis
Frequency: Once per long rest

Description

Greet the Moon is a brief rite of reverence performed under the open sky. The Garou acknowledges Luna's watchful presence, aligning their voice and presence with the rhythms of instinct, emotion, and truth.

This Rite does not compel. It invites favor.

Effect

When this Rite is performed, it remains dormant until triggered.

Once before the end of your next long rest, when you fail a Charisma-based ability check made during a social interaction, you may choose to reroll that check and use the new result.

This may apply to:

  • Charisma (Persuasion)
  • Charisma (Deception)
  • Charisma (Intimidation)
  • Charisma (Performance)
  • Any Storyteller-approved Charisma check involving social interaction

You must accept the new result.

Limitations

This Rite:

  • Can only be used once per long rest
  • Cannot be used on attack rolls, damage rolls, or saving throws
  • Must be declared after the failure but before the outcome is finalized
  • You may have only one active Greet the Moon effect at a time
